page.title: 17Liverpool Newsham,Health
page.content: Our area of Liverpool is served by 5 hospitals. 1) The Royal Liverpool is a large, modern teaching hospital with modern facilities serving a large area. 2) Newsham Park and Rathbone are geriatric hospitals. 3) Mill Road Maternity Hospital. There are many other people to look after our health. A midwife comes by to care for our new baby brothers and sisters. A distrct nurse and health visitor care for elderly, disabled and those ill at home.The school nurse and doctor visit our school regularly to check hearing, eyesight and general health. There are many family doctors and dentists in our area, and a number of modern health centres.
